K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-054:327b-0: @327b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-054:327b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-054:327b-3: ma h'a te dze te dza ma ti dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-054:327b-4: shru ta dh'a ra ni; dza yanti bi dza yanti ma ti dh'a ra n'i sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-054:328a-0: sman bra ma hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du @328a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-054:328a-2: gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-054:328a-5: thos pa nyin zhag gcig la shloo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-054:328a-6: shloo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
